item.title: Advent of Code Journey: 2020, Day 1
item.description:
I love solving Advent of Code puzzles the same way that I love running: It hurts like crazy while doing it, but it is fun getting to hang your little goofy medals up to show off to your friends.

If you aren’t familiar with Advent of Code, it is a yearly, Christmas/festive themed challenge that features you, the bedraggled, scruffy human, who attempts to solve the problems that the fun-loving, but rather goofy and seemingly not-all-together elves create by the virtue of being themselves.
